name: Bob
text: So, I'm sorry for the inconvinience! I need you to eradicate at least 4 pests

name: Bob
text: To know what pests you need to get rid of

name: Bob
text: I reccomend talking to the birds around this carpark.

name: Bob
text: Otherwise, you might not know what the pests in the bush are!

name: Bob
text: Meet me at the end of the bush when you find at least 4, Thank you, *!
